other_tests.findings: Atelectasis at the bases of the lungs; no focal lesions in the liver; no intrahepatic biliary dilatation; prominent common bile duct measuring 9 mm; normal pancreas and spleen; simple cyst in the left kidney measuring 8.6 x 6.6 cm; left distal ureter dilated with inflammatory changes; 7.6 x 8.3 mm high density focus at the left ureteropelvic junction suggestive of a stone; diverticula throughout the colon; thickened loop of sigmoid colon with 1.3 x 2.6 cm adjacent fluid collection; no suspicious lytic or blastic lesions identified.
